amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 105 which prohibits funds from being used to conduct a public-private competition or direct conversion under the OMB Circular A-76 or any other administrative regulation, directive, or policy for any Corps of Engineers program, project or activity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressionl Record to striking the prohibition of funds under the OMB Circular A-76 or any other administrative regulation, directive, or policy for the Corps of Engineers program, project or activity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 259 (Roll no. 506).
